    • Constructor Detail

      • SearchFileVisitor

        public SearchFileVisitor(boolean recursive,
                         java.lang.String search,
                         java.io.File root,
                         java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executorService)
        Parameters:
        recursive - denotes, whether this visitor should search in the sub-directories.
        search - a regular expression that should be searched for in every File that is accepted by filter and will be replaced by replacement
        root - the root of the searched file system. will always run through all entries in the root, independently from the recursive flag.

    • Method Detail

      • preVisitDirectory

        public FileVisitResult preVisitDirectory(java.io.File dir)
        Description copied from interface: FileVisitor
        Called by the visiting FileSystem before a directory will recursively be read. May return FileVisitResult.CONTINUE if the directory should be read or FileVisitResult.SKIP_SUBTREE if the given directory should not be read but the visit of the FileSystem should continue in general. Should return FileVisitResult.TERMINATE if the visit of the FileSystem in general should end.
        Specified by:
        preVisitDirectory in interface FileVisitor
        Overrides:
        preVisitDirectory in class FileVisitorAdapter
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory that may be visited
        Returns:
        if the visit should continue, skip the given directory or end at all.

      • visitFile

        public FileVisitResult visitFile(java.io.File file)
        Description copied from interface: FileVisitor
        Called by the visiting FileSystem to visit a file with this FileVisitor. May return FileVisitResult.CONTINUE if the visiting of files and directories should continue or FileVisitResult.TERMINATE if not. FileVisitResult.SKIP_SUBTREE will have the same effect as FileVisitResult.CONTINUE.
        Specified by:
        visitFile in interface FileVisitor
        Overrides:
        visitFile in class FileVisitorAdapter
        Parameters:
        file - the File that will be searched for the specific regular expression of this SandR
        Returns:
        FileVisitResult.CONTINUE

      • getFutures

        public java.util.List<java.util.concurrent.Future<SearchLineMinionResult>> getFutures()
